title: What am I bid for the tree?
creator_credit: Barrie Oldfield and Oldfield and Sons
brief_description: A satirical approach to the value of trees. Actor, James Bailey, by taking on various guises - teacher, philosopher, auctioneer, architect - tries to inform an uninterested audience of the many uses of the tree. Filmed at Wungong Brook, Western Australia - a film for Arbor Day. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
